original_text: When neither sun nor stars appeared for many days, and no small tempest lay on us, all hope of our being saved was at last abandoned.
korean_text: 여러 날 동안 해도 별도 보이지 아니하고 큰 풍랑이 그대로 있으매 구원의 여망마저 없어졌더라

sentences.original_text: When neither sun nor stars appeared
and no small tempest lay on us
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 작지 않은 폭풍이 우리에게 닥쳤고

sentences.original_text: all hope of our being saved
